audioText: Elle lui parle affectueusement en tenant son cerveau blessé dans ses mains délicates.
question: How does she speak to him?
options: Affectionately while holding his injured brain in her delicate hands
Angrily while examining his head injury carefully
Quietly while treating his minor head wound
explanation: The text states 'Elle lui parle affectueusement en tenant son cerveau blessé dans ses mains délicates' - She speaks to him affectionately while holding his injured brain in her delicate hands. The adverb 'affectueusement' (affectionately) and noun 'cerveau' (brain) with verb 'blessé' (injured) describe tender care.
